item.title: Whats wrong with this? and Jframe tooltip
item.dc:creator: @Yesteryear Yesteryear
item.description:
@Yesteryear wrote:

[quote=“RSPS222, post:5, topic:481114”][quote author=Yesteryear link=topic=599352.msg4213459#msg4213459 date=1359906784]
2. use “./1.gif”
[/quote]
with the [size=24pt]"."[/size]?[/quote]
What? No seriously, if you don’t do it that way, the compiler will give you an error.

this should show my image on the button no?
2.and how can i change the image on the tooltip ?
